name: Qore Quest
description:
Go on a daring adventure into the icy mountains of Altway to find your lover whom was in search for an ancient elixir created by a long-deceased Nubian warrior known as the Nerevarine.

Hack and slash your way through monsters in the Alweigian forest, to the frozen plateaus of Galaga's Peak, into a hidden cave network, in this 2D retro revival platformer!
